imdb.title: Patalliro!
imdb.plot: The adventures of Patalliro, the wild and uncontrollable infant king of Malynera.

episodes.title: The Bishonen Killer
episodes.plot: MI6 agent James Bancoran is hired to guard the seven-year-old king of Malynera, Patalliro. He finds the task more arduous than he expects.

episodes.title: A Flower Falls on a Misty Night
episodes.plot: Patalliro meets his estranged cousin Thatcher, who tries to assassinate him and get his throne.

episodes.title: A Rose Blooms Upon a Grave
episodes.plot: Patalliro is about to be crowned king. However an assassin lurks about ready to finish him off.

episodes.title: Look Out, Patalliro
episodes.plot: Patalliro meets his long-lost brother Marion. Meanwhile he gets a doctor for his diabetes, who instills a lethal prescription on him.

episodes.title: Maraich, the Angel of Death
episodes.plot: The International Diamond Syndicate send their best assassin, Maraich, to finish off Bancoran and Patalliro.

episodes.title: Etrange's Grief
episodes.plot: Patalliro pays a visit to his mother Etrange. However, Duran du Laken kidnaps her.

episodes.title: Kung Fu
episodes.plot: Patalliro goes insane obsessing over kung fu, and becomes a kung fu fighter. Meanwhile, a Chinese dance troupe is stealing jewels from the kingdom mines.

episodes.title: From Patalliro with Love
episodes.plot: Patalliro tells Bancoran that Maraich has turned against them, but his pleas fall on deaf ears. What is the truth?

episodes.title: A Cherry Blossom Storm
episodes.plot: Patalliro investigates the disappearance of his cousin Madeline.

episodes.title: Snow in Malynera
episodes.plot: Dr Christian endeavors to make a snow machine for his ailing sister Koko.

episodes.title: Maraich Maraich
episodes.plot: A duplicate of Maraich is sent by the International Diamond Syndicate to infiltrate MI6. Unfortunately Patalliro comes across him and causes trouble for all.

episodes.title: A Vampire in Malynera
episodes.plot: Patalliro investigates incidents of a vampire attacking the residents of his kingdom.

episodes.title: Invasion of America
episodes.plot: Patalliro teams up with a fortune-teller to take over America.

episodes.title: Patalliro the 7th and 8th
episodes.plot: Patalliro goes back in time and encounters his ancestor, Patalliro the 7th.

episodes.title: Prince Maraich
episodes.plot: Patalliro forces Maraich to act as prince at his father's college, while he investigates a mystery surrounding the college.

episodes.title: Twinkle Twinkle, Tamanegi!
episodes.plot: One of Patalliro's palace guards has had enough of his master's hyperactive tendencies, and decides to betray him for a profit.

episodes.title: Journey to the Moon
episodes.plot: Patalliro discovers a young prodigy who has the ability to heal people. But this power comes at a dreadful cost.

episodes.title: Super-Robot Plasma X
episodes.plot: Patalliro builds Plasma X, a super robot.

episodes.title: Plasma's Love
episodes.plot: Plasma X is lonely and asks Patalliro to build him a female robot for company.

episodes.title: License to Kill
episodes.plot: Maraich is brought in on a special case to catch a drug kingpin, but gets kidnapped.

episodes.title: Fly Away Jack
episodes.plot: Patalliro adopts a monster duck, calls it Jack, and has an adventure with him.

episodes.title: Papa Plasma
episodes.plot: A rival of Patalliro is jealous over his creation of the advanced robot Plasma X, and tries to sabotage him.

episodes.title: Patarillo 8th and 10th
episodes.plot: Patalliro is contacted by his descendant from the future to help him stop a tyrant in his timeline.

episodes.title: The Story of the Loyalty Tree
episodes.plot: Patalliro investigates a tree in Paris that is said to be the symbol of loyalty.

episodes.title: Gelman Castle
episodes.plot: Patalliro's cousin Johann comes for help: his sister Crystia has been abducted.

episodes.title: Nyanko is Nyanko
episodes.plot: A love affair between a Malyneran cat and a rich cat left millions alerts Patalliro to a dreadful scheme to kill the rich cat.

episodes.title: I'll Be Waiting
episodes.plot: Bancoran's workaholic schedule leaves Maraich depressed and lonely, leading him into the arms of a past love who is also a criminal.

episodes.title: When the Snow Stopped
episodes.plot: Bancoran attends a winter party hosted by his friend General Grosvenor. But when Grosvenor ends up dead, a mystery unfolds.

episodes.title: Sunflower of Versailles
episodes.plot: Patalliro's descendant summons him because one of his guards is running around in 17th century France and risking history being smashed.

episodes.title: I Love Maraich
episodes.plot: Young orphan Mark Swanson finds Maraich looks like his mother. Unfortunately, he looks like Patalliro, so much confusion ensues.

episodes.title: That Man Bancoran
episodes.plot: Patalliro discovers Bancoran is hiding a man from Maraich. But what is the truth?

episodes.title: Phantom
episodes.plot: Bancoran is on the trail of the Phantom, an unstoppable assassin with psychic powers.

episodes.title: Ahh... New School Term Amid the Flowers
episodes.plot: Purara goes to a boarding school as a human being. Her robot father follows her, much to her embarrassment, but he puts his life at risk for her sake.

episodes.title: Foggy London Airport 1
episodes.plot: Bancoran's first love Damien comes back into his life, filling Maraich with jealousy.

episodes.title: Foggy London Airport 2
episodes.plot: Bancoran engages in a confrontation with Damien for Maraich at London Airport.
